name: 洪魏寬
objective: 本課程將介紹：(1) 基礎量子力學，(2) 古典固態理論，(3) 晶格結構與 x-ray 繞射，(4) 電子結構理論，(5) 表面效應，(6) 半導體特性專論。
schedule:
1-2.Crystal structure
3-4.Wave diffraction and reciprocal lattice
5.Crystal binding
6.Elastic properties
7.Phonons - crystal vibrations
8.Phonons - thermal properties
9.Midterm exam.
10-11.Free electron gas
12-13.Energy bands
14-15.Semiconductor crystals
16-17.Optical properties of solids
18.Final exam.
視情形調整進度。
scorePolicy:
報告: 50%
期末考: 50%
出席: bonus
materials:
Textbook:Introduction to Solid State Physics, global ed., by Charles Kittel (Wiley, 2018).
Recommended:
1. Solid State Physics, by N. W. Ashcroft and N. D. Mermin.
2. The Physics of Semiconductors: with applications to optoelectronic devices, by Brennan.
3. Optical Properties of Solids, by Mark Fox.
